title: [Large-scale] Online-Based Critical Thinking Competency Enhancement Program for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning via LMS in a BYOD environment, including problem-solving activities based on real clinical cases

learning_goals: Learners can derive core nursing issues with 80% accuracy by analyzing clinical scenarios presented in an online learning environment.
Learners achieve at least 70% competency in articulating critical thinking processes based on peer feedback and instructor evaluations in LMS discussion boards.
Learners demonstrate a 15% or higher improvement in scores on CCTST-like measurement tools compared to pre-assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
